plugin.name: canonical
plugin.author: Jeff Abbruzzi
plugin.title: Canonical Tagging Plugin for SEO
plugin.description: \ Enables auto-resolution of canonical link metadata for SEO optimization. Addition of a taglib call to a master layout will add SEO-friendly canonical URL metadata to your pages (<canonical:show />, relying on Grails UrlMappings to derive an absolute canonical URL for the current request. Query parameters are sorted, and individual parameters can optionally be excluded globally and for specific requests (for example, a session parameter or marketing-related tracking parameters can be excluded from canonical URLs.) Finally, auto-resolution can be overriden at the request-level with a specific URI if and when needed. See http://googlewebmastercentral.blogspot.com/2009/02/specify-your-canonical.html for details on this practice.
